languages.text: "Вот она — неблагодарность и недалекость насекомых, именуемых Человечеством. Дитя, я не бренное тело, которое можно сразить. Мне принадлежит время — и все нити на полотне судеб. Достаточно коснуться одной из них..." {n}Резкая боль, и тонкая струйка крови сбегает по виску. В молчании невидимого собеседника — привкус мрачной торжественности.{/n} "Но я великодушен и даю своим избранным Детям время для осмысления..."

"There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."
languages.original_text: "Вот она — неблагодарность и недалекость насекомых, именуемых Человечеством. Дитя, я не бренное тело, которое можно сразить. Мне принадлежит время — и все нити на полотне судеб. Достаточно коснуться одной из них..." {n}Резкая боль, и тонкая струйка крови сбегает по виску. В молчании невидимого собеседника — привкус мрачной торжественности.{/n} "Но я великодушен и даю своим избранным Детям время для осмысления..."

languages.text: "Da haben wir es: den Undank und die Selbstvergessenheit der Insekten, die sich als Menschheit bezeichnen. Ich habe keinen festen Körper, den man erschlagen kann, Kind. Mir gehört die Zeit und jeder einzelne Faden im Geflecht der Schicksale. Ich muss nur einen davon berühren ..." {n}Du spürst einen stechenden Schmerz und ein dünnes Rinnsal aus Blut an deiner Schläfe. Eine grimmige Feierlichkeit liegt auf dem Schweigen deines unsichtbaren Gesprächspartners.{/n} "Aber ich bin großzügig: Ich gebe meinen auserwählten Kindern Zeit, zu verstehen ..."
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

Mir gehört die Zeit und jeder einzelne Faden im Geflecht der Schicksale. Ich muss nur einen davon berühren ..." {n}Du spürst einen stechenden Schmerz und ein dünnes Rinnsal aus Blut an deiner Schläfe. Eine grimmige Feierlichkeit liegt auf dem Schweigen deines unsichtbaren Gesprächspartners.{/n} "Aber ich bin großzügig: Ich gebe meinen auserwählten Kindern Zeit, zu verstehen ..."

languages.text: "İşte şimdi oldu... Kendilerine İnsanlık diyen böceklerin nankörlüğü ve kayıtsızlığı. Öldürülebilecek bir beden değilim ben Çocuğum. Tüm zaman bana ait, tıpkı kaderin kilimindeki her bir ilmik gibi. Birine dokunmam yeterli..." {n}Keskin bir acı hissediyorsun, şakağından bir damla kan akıyor. Görünmeyen muhatabının sessizliğine acımasız bir ciddiyetin tadı siniyor.{/n} "Ancak ben cömertim. Çocuklarıma anlamaları için zaman tanırım..."
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

traits.locale_text: "İşte şimdi oldu... Kendilerine İnsanlık diyen böceklerin nankörlüğü ve kayıtsızlığı. Öldürülebilecek bir beden değilim ben Çocuğum. Tüm zaman bana ait, tıpkı kaderin kilimindeki her bir ilmik gibi. Birine dokunmam yeterli..." {n}Keskin bir acı hissediyorsun, şakağından bir damla kan akıyor. Görünmeyen muhatabının sessizliğine acımasız bir ciddiyetin tadı siniyor.{/n} "Ancak ben cömertim. Çocuklarıma anlamaları için zaman tanırım..."

languages.text: « Nous y sommes : l'ingratitude et le manque de discernement typique des insectes qui se font appeler humanité. Mon corps n'est pas tangible et ne peut être pourfendu, mon enfant. Tout le temps m'appartient, tout comme chaque fil de la tapisserie des destinées. Il me suffit d'en toucher un seul... » {n}Une douleur vive vous fait tressaillir et un filet de sang se met à couler le long de votre tempe. Le silence de votre interlocuteur invisible se teinte d'un sentiment de solennité sinistre.{/n} « Mais je suis généreux : j'accorde à mes enfants élus le temps de comprendre... »
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous y sommes : l'ingratitude et le manque de discernement typique des insectes qui se font appeler humanité. Mon corps n'est pas tangible et ne peut être pourfendu, mon enfant. Tout le temps m'appartient, tout comme chaque fil de la tapisserie des destinées. Il me suffit d'en toucher un seul... » {n}Une douleur vive vous fait tressaillir et un filet de sang se met à couler le long de votre tempe. Le silence de votre interlocuteur invisible se teinte d'un sentiment de solennité sinistre.{/n} « Mais je suis généreux : j'accorde à mes enfants élus le temps de comprendre... »

languages.text: «He aquí la ingratitud y la insensatez de los insectos que se hacen llamar Humanidad. Carezco de un cuerpo físico que puedas destruir, criatura. La totalidad del tiempo me pertenece, así como los hilos que conforman el tapiz de los destinos. Tan solo he de rozar uno de ellos...». {n}Notas un dolor agudo, y un hilillo de sangre te resbala por la sien. El silencio de tu interlocutor invisible se ve acentuado por una sombría solemnidad.{/n} «Mas soy generoso, y otorgo a mis criaturas tiempo para comprender...».
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

traits.locale_text: «He aquí la ingratitud y la insensatez de los insectos que se hacen llamar Humanidad. Carezco de un cuerpo físico que puedas destruir, criatura. La totalidad del tiempo me pertenece, así como los hilos que conforman el tapiz de los destinos. Tan solo he de rozar uno de ellos...». {n}Notas un dolor agudo, y un hilillo de sangre te resbala por la sien. El silencio de tu interlocutor invisible se ve acentuado por una sombría solemnidad.{/n} «Mas soy generoso, y otorgo a mis criaturas tiempo para comprender...».

languages.text: “你看，那些自称为‘人类’的蛆虫是如此健忘，如此忘恩负义。我没有实体，没人能将我消灭，孩子。所有的时间线都在我的掌控之中，命运织锦上的每根绣线都属于我。我只要轻轻触碰其中的某根丝线……”{n}你感到一阵剧痛，鲜血顺着你的太阳穴流了下来。那位无形的实体再次开了口，充满了严肃的意味。{/n}“不过，我很慷慨，我愿意等待我的神选之子慢慢理解这一切……”
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

traits.locale_text: “你看，那些自称为‘人类’的蛆虫是如此健忘，如此忘恩负义。我没有实体，没人能将我消灭，孩子。所有的时间线都在我的掌控之中，命运织锦上的每根绣线都属于我。我只要轻轻触碰其中的某根丝线……”{n}你感到一阵剧痛，鲜血顺着你的太阳穴流了下来。那位无形的实体再次开了口，充满了严肃的意味。{/n}“不过，我很慷慨，我愿意等待我的神选之子慢慢理解这一切……”

languages.text: 「これだ。自らを人類と呼ぶ虫けらたちの恩知らずで無自覚な姿だ。私は殺されるような実体を持つ存在ではない、子よ。すべての時は私のものであり、運命の織物のすべての糸もまたそうだ。私はただその一つに触れればよいのだ…」{n}あなたは鋭い痛みを感じ、こめかみから血が一筋流れる。見えざる対話者の沈黙に厳粛な厳しさの味わいが漂う。{/n}「しかし、私は寛大だ。選ばれし子らに理解するための時間を与える…」
languages.original_text: "There it is: the ingratitude and obliviousness of the insects that call themselves Humanity. I am no corporeal body that can be slain, Child. All of time belongs to me, as does every thread in the tapestry of destinies. I need but touch one of them..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple. A taste of grim solemnity permeates the silence of your unseen interlocutor.{/n} "But I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand..."

traits.locale_text: 「これだ。自らを人類と呼ぶ虫けらたちの恩知らずで無自覚な姿だ。私は殺されるような実体を持つ存在ではない、子よ。すべての時は私のものであり、運命の織物のすべての糸もまたそうだ。私はただその一つに触れればよいのだ…」{n}あなたは鋭い痛みを感じ、こめかみから血が一筋流れる。見えざる対話者の沈黙に厳粛な厳しさの味わいが漂う。{/n}「しかし、私は寛大だ。選ばれし子らに理解するための時間を与える…」
